Description: Trigger error when a visit is not described in the protocol

  Message: VISIT is not described in the protocol

              Version: '1'
            Version: '2.0'
            Citations:
              - Cited Guidance: Protocol-defined description of clinical encounter.
                Document: IG v3.4
                Item: Specification
                Section: 7.3.1
Scope:

    Include:
      - TRIAL DESIGN
  Domains:
    Include:
      - TV
